amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $390 million appropriated for the space station.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, preprinted in the Congressional Record of July 26 as amendment No. 57, to cut $1.6 billion from the NASA Human Space Flight Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 287 (Roll no. 598).
